Josie Briggs Hall (September 17, 1869 October 25, 1935) bụ onye edemede na onye nkuzi Amerika
O dere akwụkwọ mbụ nke nwanyị ojii Texan bipụtara.
A mụrụ Josie Briggs na Waxahachie, Texas na Septemba 17, 1869
Nne na nna ya, Henry na Tennie Briggs, nwụrụ mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na otu
Briggs na nwanne ya nwanyị biri wee gaa Bishop College na Marshall, Texas n'ihe dị ka nke afọ 1886 mana ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ.
Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii, Briggs nwetara ọrụ nkuzi mbụ ya na Kenan, Texas
N'afọ 1888, ọ lụrụ onye nkuzi ụlọ akwụkwọ J
Di na nwunye ahụ mụrụ ụmụ ise. Ọ kụzikwaara na obodo Texas Ray na Mexia, na obodo Mississippi Peyton na Tunica.
Josie Briggs Hall fọrọ nke nta ka ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ mbụ ya mgbe ọkụ gbara akwụkwọ ahụ n'afọ 1898

Akwụkwọ ya ọzọ, A Scroll of Facts and Advice (Houxīs Printery, 1905), bụ akwụkwọ mbụ nke nwanyị ojii Texan bipụtara. Ọ sochiri ya na Akụkọ Omume na Mental maka Ndụ Azụmaahịa na Ezinụlọ nke Negro, Dị ka Ngwọta maka Nsogbu Agbụrụ (R.S

Jenkins, 1905), nchịkọta nke abụ na edemede mbụ, ihe e bipụtara ọzọ, na ihe osise na foto nke ndị isi ojii na Texas na United States. Akwụkwọ ahụ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ akwụkwọ ntuziaka onwe onye yiri akwụkwọ ọgụgụ..
nke a na-ere na ndị Afrika Amerika na-achọ agụmakwụkwọ n'èzí klas ọdịnala. A kpaliri Hall ide ya n'akụkụ ụfọdụ iji dọọ ndị nne na nna nke ụmụaka dịka ndị ọ kụziri.
Hall mechara kwaga Dallas wee guzobe ụlọ akwụkwọ Ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe na azụmahịa nke Homemakersń, nke ọ na-elekọta site n'afọ 1916 ruo 1928.
Hall nwụrụ na October 25, 1935, na Dallas.
N'afọ 1936, e tinyere abụ Hall n'akwụkwọ akụkọ nke ndị na-ede abụ ojii nke Texas, Heralding Down: An Anthology of Verse, nke J
